trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<select>" name="<select>" href=""></xref> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Permite o acesso programático para HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<select>" name="<select>" href=""> </xref> elemento no servidor.

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlSelect control to create a selection box.
trans-unit.target: Use o controle HtmlSelect para criar uma caixa de seleção.

trans-unit.source: Specify item listings in the control by placing HTML `<option>` elements between the opening and closing `<select>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Especificar listas de item no controle colocando HTML `<option>` elementos entre a abertura e fechamento `<select>` marcas.

trans-unit.source: Each item is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada item é representado por um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=fullName>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify the text that is displayed for each item in the control, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the item, or simply place text between the opening and closing `<option>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar o texto que é exibido para cada item no controle, você pode definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do item, ou simplesmente insira o texto entre a abertura e fechamento `<option>` marcas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the item, you can associate a value with the item that is different from the text.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do item, você pode associar um valor com o item que é diferente do texto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To select an item from the list by default, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the item to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar um item da lista, por padrão, defina o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do item a ser `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance and behavior of the HtmlSelect control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode controlar a aparência e comportamento do controle HtmlSelect definindo a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property specifies the height (in rows) of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>propriedade especifica a altura (em linhas) do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property specifies whether more than one item can be concurrently selected in the HtmlSelect control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>propriedade especifica se mais de um item pode ser selecionado simultaneamente no controle HtmlSelect.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the HtmlSelect control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o controle HtmlSelect é exibido como uma caixa de listagem suspensa.

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se você permitir que várias seleções (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>propriedade `true`) ou especifique uma altura maior do que uma linha (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>propriedade para um valor maior que `1`), o controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected item in a single-selection HtmlSelect control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property to get the index of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o item selecionado em um controle de HtmlSelect seleção única, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade para obter o índice do item selecionado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then use this value to retrieve the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse valor para recuperar o item do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items from an HtmlSelect control that allows multiple selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar os itens selecionados a partir de um controle HtmlSelect que permita várias seleções, percorrer o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleta e teste o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de cada item.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HtmlSelect class provides two properties to support data binding.
trans-unit.target: Classe HtmlSelect fornece duas propriedades para dar suporte à associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: To bind data to any object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>), or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Para associar dados a qualquer objeto que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>interface (como <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>), ou o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>interface, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>propriedade para especificar a fonte de dados para associar a.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property, you must manually write the code to perform the data binding.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>propriedade manualmente você deve escrever o código para executar a associação de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To automatically bind an HtmlSelect control to a data source represented by a data source control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property and set its value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the data source control to use.
trans-unit.target: Para vincular um controle HtmlSelect automaticamente a uma fonte de dados representada por um controle de fonte de dados, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade e defina seu valor como o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>propriedade do controle de fonte de dados usar.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, the HtmlSelect control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade, o controle HtmlSelect associa automaticamente para o controle de fonte de dados especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você não precisa chamar explicitamente o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify which fields in the data source bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of an item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode especificar quais campos na fonte de dados de ligação para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades de um item no controle definindo a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>Propriedades, respectivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sources of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify the specific source to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Se a fonte de dados contiver várias fontes de dados, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>propriedade para especificar a origem específica para associar ao controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você tiver um <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>do objeto com várias tabelas, você deve especificar qual tabela para associar o controle com o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlSelect, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do HtmlSelect, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra o valor da propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>|The "select" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>| A cadeia de caracteres literal "select". |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a parsed child control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um controle filho analisado para a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The AddParsedSubObject method is used by ASP.NET to add parsed child controls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O método AddParsedSubObject é usado pelo ASP.NET para adicionar controles filho analisado para a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The parsed child control to add.
trans-unit.target: O controle filho analisado para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The child control specified by the obj parameter must be of the type .
trans-unit.target: O controle filho especificado pelo obj parâmetro deve ser do tipo .

trans-unit.source: Clears the list selection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of all items to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a seleção de lista da <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle e define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade de todos os itens a serem <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ClearSelection method iterates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object to `false`.
trans-unit.target: O método ClearSelection itera por meio a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>coleção representado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>propriedade e configura o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>propriedade de cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>do objeto para `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"> </xref> de objeto para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control does not allow child controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle não permite controles filho.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> to contain the current server control's child server controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> para conter controles de servidor do filho do controle de servidor atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the set of data to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control from a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*> property with multiple sets of data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o conjunto de dados para associar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> de controle de um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>propriedade com vários conjuntos de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property contains multiple sets of data, use the DataMember property to specify which set of data to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>propriedade contém vários conjuntos de dados, use a propriedade DataMember para especificar qual conjunto de dados para associar ao controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, use this property to indicate which table to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você tiver um <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>de objeto com várias tabelas, use esta propriedade para indicar qual tabela para associar ao controle.</xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After you have specified the data source to bind to the control, you can then specify which fields from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of each item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Depois de especificar a fonte de dados para associar ao controle, você pode especificar quais campos da fonte de dados para associar a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades de cada item no controle definindo a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>Propriedades, respectivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The set of data to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control from a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*> with multiple sets of data.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de dados para associar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> de controle de um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>com vários conjuntos de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates the property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), que indica a propriedade não foi definido.

trans-unit.source: The DataMember property is set during the data-binding phase of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataMember é definida durante a fase de associação de dados do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source of information to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte de informações para associar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSource property to specify the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de fonte de dados para especificar a fonte de dados para associar ao <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: A data source must be a collection that implements either the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>) or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: Uma fonte de dados deve ser uma coleção que implementa o o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>interface (como <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, ou <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>) ou o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the DataSource property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding.
trans-unit.target: Quando você definir a propriedade de fonte de dados, você deve manualmente escrever o código para executar associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sets of data, such as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify which data set to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Se a fonte de dados contém vários conjuntos de dados, como um <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>do objeto com várias tabelas, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>propriedade para especificar o conjunto de dados para associar ao controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can specify which fields from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of each item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar quais campos da fonte de dados para associar a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades de cada item no controle definindo a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>Propriedades, respectivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade para associar automaticamente a uma fonte de dados representada por um controle de fonte de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade, os dados de controle de listagem automaticamente associa ao controle de fonte de dados especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind*> method.

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET automatically binds the data listing control to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Quando você especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade, o ASP.NET automaticamente associa os dados de lista de controle para o controle de fonte de dados especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET performs data binding for the control, it calls the EnsureDataBound method first to verify that the control has not already been data-bound and that a valid data source control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface is specified for its <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o ASP.NET executa a associação de dados para o controle, ele chama o método de EnsureDataBound primeiro para verificar se o controle já não foi associado a dados e que uma fonte de dados válido controle que implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>interface é especificada para sua <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The EnsureDataBound method then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to ensure that the control is data-bound immediately after the call to this method.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, chama o método EnsureDataBound o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>método para garantir que o controle associado a dados imediatamente após a chamada a este método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GetData method returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object independent of whether the data source was specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método GetData retorna um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>objeto independentemente de se a fonte de dados especificada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Restores the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's view state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState*> method.
trans-unit.target: Restaura o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> exibição de controle solicitação de informações de estado de uma página anterior que foi salvo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado basicamente pela infraestrutura do .NET Framework e não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, os desenvolvedores de controle podem substituir este método para especificar como um controle de servidor personalizado restaura o estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>campo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto mantém o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>estado de exibição básica do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>campo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto mantém o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>coleção representado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the selected indices represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>campo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto contém os índices selecionados representados pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected concurrently in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se vários itens podem ser selecionados ao mesmo tempo no <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the Multiple property to specify whether multiple items can be concurrently selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade vários para especificar se vários itens podem ser selecionados ao mesmo tempo no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem suspensa.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the Multiple property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se você permitir que várias seleções (definindo a propriedade vários como `true`) ou especifique uma altura maior do que uma linha (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>propriedade para um valor maior que `1`), o controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar os itens selecionados em um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle que permita várias seleções simultâneas, percorrer o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleta e teste o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de cada item.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `multiple` attribute is rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control only if this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O `multiple` atributo é renderizado no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlar somente se essa propriedade é definida como `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the `get` accessor returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Nessa implementação, o `get` acessador retorna o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, the `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o `set` acessador não atribui um valor para essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property because the Name property must have the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to work properly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O `set` acessador não atribuir um valor para essa propriedade porque a propriedade de nome deve ter o mesmo valor que o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle funcione corretamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>evento é gerado quando os dados serão associados ao <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Este método notifica o controle para executar qualquer lógica de associação de dados que está associada ele.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the OnDataBinding method creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection from the data source specified in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, o método OnDataBinding cria o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção da fonte de dados especificado em qualquer um de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnDataBinding method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnDataBinding também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"> </xref> eventos para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: O método OnInit notifica o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle para executar as etapas de inicialização que são necessárias para criar e configurar uma instância.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> property is `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> property is `true`, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>é de propriedade `false` e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A>é de propriedade `true`, em seguida, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"> </xref> eventos para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The OnLoad method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that it should perform actions common to each HTTP request for the page it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: O método OnLoad notifica o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlar que ele deve executar ações comuns a cada solicitação HTTP para a página está associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The OnLoad method connects the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to the appropriate data source specified in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método OnLoad se conecta a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle à fonte de dados apropriado especificado no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property is to specify the data source control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control should use to retrieve its data source, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method is set as the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>é de propriedade para especificar a fonte de dados de controle que o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle deve usar para recuperar a fonte de dados, em seguida, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>método está definido como o manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> eventos para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property is greater than 1, then the OnPreRender method registers the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> control as one that requires postback processing.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>propriedade for maior que 1, o método OnPreRender registra o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlar com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>controle como um que requer processamento postback.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange"> </xref> evento o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você forneça um manipulador personalizado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event is raised when the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>é gerado quando os itens selecionados no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>alteração de controle entre postagens para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This event is raised only when the user initiates a post to the server, such as by clicking a Submit button.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Esse evento é gerado apenas quando o usuário inicia um post para o servidor, como ao clicar em um botão de envio.

trans-unit.source: This event does not cause a post to the server to occur.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não faz com que um post para o servidor ocorra.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O controle deve ter o estado de exibição habilitado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>evento funcione corretamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform data validation on the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control when the user changes the selection in the control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse evento para realizar a validação de dados no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controlar quando o usuário altera a seleção no controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnServerChange method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnServerChange também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange*> method to signal the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange*>método para sinalizar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle o estado do controle é alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange*>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O método RaisePostDataChangedEvent é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's attributes to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> atributos do controle especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The RenderAttributes method renders the `name` attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control directly to ensure that it has the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderAttributes renderiza o `name` atributo do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle diretamente para garantir que ele tem o mesmo valor que o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: After rendering the attribute, the RenderAttributes method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Após processar o atributo, o método RenderAttributes chama a classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RenderAttributes method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderAttributes é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que recebe o conteúdo renderizado.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's child controls to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controles do filho do controle especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The RenderChildren method overrides the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> method without calling the base method.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderChildren substitui a classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>método sem chamar o método base.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each of the `<option>` elements between the opening and closing `<select>` tags is rendered with a `value` attribute, a `selected` attribute if the item is selected, and its associated text.
trans-unit.target: Cada uma da `<option>` elementos entre a abertura e fechamento `<select>` marcas é processado com um `value` atributo, um `selected` atributo se o item é selecionado e seu texto associado.

trans-unit.source: If multiple items were selected but the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is set to `false`, then an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se foram selecionados vários itens, mas o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>está definida como `false`, então um <xref:System.Web.HttpException>exceção será lançada.</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que recebe o conteúdo renderizado.

trans-unit.source: Multiple items were selected but the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Foram selecionados vários itens, mas o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple*>está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control needs to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle precisa associar a fonte de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control uses the RequiresDataBinding property to determine whether the control needs to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle usa a propriedade RequiresDataBinding para determinar se o controle precisa chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>método para associar a fonte de dados especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Each time the `set` accessor is called on either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to change the data source after the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> method has already been called, ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the RequiresDataBinding property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Cada vez que o `set` acessador for chamado em um a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>propriedade para alterar a fonte de dados após o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A>método já foi chamado, o ASP.NET define automaticamente o valor da propriedade RequiresDataBinding para `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the RequiresDataBinding property is also set to `true` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade RequiresDataBinding também é definido como `true` quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>método é invocado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the RequiresDataBinding property to `false` immediately after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: O ASP.NET define automaticamente o valor da propriedade RequiresDataBinding para `false` imediatamente após o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>método foi chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control needs to bind to a data source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle precisa associar a uma fonte de dados; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves any <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control view state changes that have occurred since the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Salva qualquer <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> exibição de controle muda de estado que ocorreram desde que a página foi postada no servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's view state is stored as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>estado de exibição do controle é armazenado como um <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>campo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto mantém o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>estado de exibição básica do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>campo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto mantém o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>coleção representado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the selected indices represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>campo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objeto contém os índices selecionados representados pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to save the control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: O método SaveViewState chama a classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para salvar o estado de exibição básica do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: O método SaveViewState é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que contém as alterações para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> o estado de exibição.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the object, this method returns a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum estado de exibição é associado ao objeto, esse método retorna uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Selects multiple items of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Selecionar vários itens do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items*>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The Select method selects multiple items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O método Select seleciona vários itens do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Int32> that contains the items to select.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Array>do tipo <xref:System.Int32>que contém os itens a serem selecionados.</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ordinal index of the selected item in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice ordinal do item selecionado em uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndex property is commonly used to determine the index of the selected item in a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SelectedIndex é comumente usada para determinar o índice do item selecionado em uma única seleção <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: This index can then be used to retrieve the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Esse índice, em seguida, pode ser usado para recuperar o item do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is set to `true`, indicating that multiple items can be concurrently selected, the SelectedIndex property contains the index of the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>está definida como `true`, indicando que vários itens podem ser selecionados ao mesmo tempo, a propriedade SelectedIndex contém o índice do primeiro item selecionado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items from an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar os itens selecionados de um <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle que permita várias seleções simultâneas, percorrer o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleta e teste o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de cada item.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > It is possible to have no item selected.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > É possível ter nenhum item selecionado.

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected, the SelectedIndex property contains a value of `-1`.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum item for selecionado, a propriedade SelectedIndex contém um valor de `-1`.

trans-unit.source: This commonly occurs when the page first loads and an item is not selected by default.
trans-unit.target: Isso normalmente ocorre quando a página for carregada pela primeira vez e um item não é selecionado por padrão.

trans-unit.source: Provide code to test this value before referencing the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Forneça o código para testar esse valor antes de consultar o item no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an exception is thrown if the index is out of the range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, uma exceção é gerada se o índice está fora do intervalo da coleção.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem suspensa.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se você permitir que várias seleções (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>propriedade `true`) ou especifique uma altura maior do que uma linha (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>propriedade para um valor maior que `1`), o controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a drop-down list box is displayed, an item is always selected.
trans-unit.target: Se for exibida uma caixa de listagem suspensa, um item sempre é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: If a list box is displayed, you can programmatically clear the selection from all items by setting the SelectedIndex property to `-1`.
trans-unit.target: Se for exibida uma caixa de listagem, você pode desmarcar a seleção de todos os itens programaticamente, definindo a propriedade SelectedIndex como `-1`.

trans-unit.source: The ordinal index of the selected item in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice ordinal do item selecionado em uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref> indicates that no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref> indica que nenhum item selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control or less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade foi definida como um valor maior que o número de itens no <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle ou menor que <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção que contém os índices com base em zero de todos os itens selecionados no momento no <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndices property is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class to return a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SelectedIndices é usada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>classe para retornar uma coleção que contém atualmente os índices com base em zero de todos os itens selecionados no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class can override the SelectedIndices property to provide a custom algorithm for returning currently selected items.
trans-unit.target: Controlar os desenvolvedores estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>classe pode substituir a propriedade SelectedIndices para fornecer um algoritmo personalizado para retornar atualmente os itens selecionados.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém atualmente os índices com base em zero de todos os itens selecionados no <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selected items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando os itens selecionados no <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> alteração de controle entre postagens para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The ServerChange event is raised when the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O evento ServerChange é gerado quando os itens selecionados no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>alteração de controle entre postagens para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control must have view state enabled for the ServerChange event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O controle deve ter o estado de exibição habilitado para o evento ServerChange funcione corretamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height (in rows) of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura (em linhas) da <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the Size property to specify the height (in rows) of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de tamanho para especificar a altura (em linhas) da <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If you specify a size that is smaller than the number of items in the control, scroll bars are displayed to allow you to move up and down the list.
trans-unit.target: Se você especificar um tamanho menor que o número de itens no controle, barras de rolagem são exibidas para que você possa mover para cima e a lista.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem suspensa.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the Size property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Se você permitir que várias seleções (definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>propriedade `true`) ou especifique uma altura maior do que uma linha (definindo a propriedade de tamanho para um valor maior que `1`), o controle é exibido como uma caixa de listagem.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: Tracks view state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control so the changes can be stored in the control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rastreia exibir alterações de estado para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle para que as alterações podem ser armazenadas no controle do <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto é acessível por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The TrackViewState method persists items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to view state.
trans-unit.target: O método TrackViewState persiste itens o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>controle no estado de exibição.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex*> property of the control to the index of the first item in the list with the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do item selecionado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle ou conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex*>propriedade do controle para o índice do primeiro item na lista com o valor especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The Value property is commonly used to get the value of the item referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de valor geralmente é usada para obter o valor do item referenciado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If no item is selected in the control, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se nenhum item selecionado no controle, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>será retornado.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is updated with the index of the first item in the list that contains that value.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir essa propriedade como um valor, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade é atualizada com o índice do primeiro item na lista que contém o valor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no matching value is found, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum valor correspondente for encontrado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>propriedade fica inalterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O valor do item selecionado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected in the control, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum item selecionado no controle, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> é retornado.
